title: Unauthenticated -> Archived Game -> Recap/Condensed -> Feed Select page
custom_preconds: User should not be logged in
custom_steps:
1. User should Launch the MLB App 
2. Navigate to Top Nav and select the Games
3. Select a game which is Final

WHEN the user selects the Archived Game
custom_expected:
THEN Text can be seen at the top of the modal, Watch Free Section, Condensed Game and Recap, and Full Game Access Section, Get MLB.TV and Login

Design:
https://www.figma.com/file/GXA6AEVwJY10f9iBG3zHQH/session?node-id=332:24680

title: Authenticated -> Live Game -> Resume -> Feed Select page

title: Verify National Blackout Messaging Appears on Feed Select Modal
custom_preconds:
1. User should Login with a National account which the user is blacked out

Check this scenario in Hero/Games/Game carousel.
custom_steps:
User should Launch the MLB App
Navigate to Top Nav and select the Games
Select the blackout National feed
custom_expected:
THEN user should see the Blackout message when the feed is selected.

Design: 
https://www.figma.com/file/GXA6AEVwJY10f9iBG3zHQH/MLB.TV-System?type=design&node-id=9%3A4790&t=817g9MjS7f51cWZx-1

title: Verify International Blackout Messaging Appears on Feed Select Modal
custom_preconds:
1. User should Login with a International account which the user is blacked out

Check this scenario in Hero/Games/Game carousel.
custom_steps:
User should Launch the MLB App
Navigate to Top Nav and select the Games
Select the blackout International feed
custom_expected:
THEN user should see the Blackout message when the feed is selected.

Design: 
https://www.figma.com/file/GXA6AEVwJY10f9iBG3zHQH/MLB.TV-System?type=design&node-id=9%3A4790&t=817g9MjS7f51cWZx-1

title: Verify Partner games Blackout Messaging Appears on Feed Select Modal
custom_preconds:
1. User should Login with a International account which the user is blacked out

Check this scenario in Hero/Games/Game carousel.
custom_steps:
User should Launch the MLB App
Navigate to Top Nav and select the Games
Select Partner games like YouTube,Peacock,AppleTV feed

WHEN the user select any Partner games
custom_expected:
THEN user should see the Blackout messaging on the game tiles that are in the "blackout market"
After 90 mins, after the partner game completes, ensure the game tile follows the normal rules (ie if a user requires additional subscription show lock icon)

Design: 
https://www.figma.com/file/GXA6AEVwJY10f9iBG3zHQH/MLB.TV-System?type=design&node-id=9%3A4790&t=817g9MjS7f51cWZx-1

title: Verify Pre Game text in Feed Select
custom_preconds: 1. User should Login with a valid account
custom_steps:
User should Launch the MLB App
Navigate to Top Nav and select the Games option

WHEN the user selects the Game Tile with both teams or any one team has started Pregame
custom_expected:
THEN  user should see the "Pregame" text on the game tile for both or any one team until it is Live.

Design: 
https://www.figma.com/file/GXA6AEVwJY10f9iBG3zHQH/MLB.TV-System?type=design&node-id=332%3A26036&t=RJxLn9hEb0xmPKXI-1

title: Verify Post Game text in Feed Select
custom_preconds: 1. User should Login with a valid account
custom_steps:
User should Launch the MLB App
Navigate to Top Nav and select the Games option

WHEN the user selects the Game Tile with both teams or any one team has Postgame
custom_expected:
THEN  user should see the "Postgame" text on the game tile for both or any one team until the text changed to Final.

Design: 
https://www.figma.com/file/GXA6AEVwJY10f9iBG3zHQH/MLB.TV-System?type=design&node-id=332%3A26036&t=RJxLn9hEb0xmPKXI-1

title: Authenticated -> Postponed -> Feed Select page
custom_preconds: User should Login with any valid account
custom_steps:
1. User should Launch the MLB App 
2. Navigate to Top Nav and select the Games
3. Select the Postponed game

When the game is put into any type of postponement, Rain, Snow, Tragedy, Weather Increment, Cancelled etc
custom_expected:
||WHEN the user select the postponed game states| Then user should see the tag on the game tile. Eg: 'Rain', 'Weather Increment' etc
||And When the game is selected| THEN user should see the modal stating "This game has no available feed at this time" message.

title: Authenticated -> Live Game -> From Beginning ON  -> Feed Select page
custom_preconds:
1. User should be logged in
2. Set Watch Live games from Beginning is ON from Settings
custom_steps:
1. User should Launch the MLB App 
2. Navigate to Top Nav and select the Games

WHEN the user selects a Live game
custom_expected:
||WHEN the user selects a Live game|THEN the feed select modal should appear with Audio(if applicable)/Video feeds.
||WHEN the user selects any feed|THEN the game should start from the beginning. 
||WHEN the user exit and then returns to the same game|THEN the bookmark should set. And the playback should start from the point where they left off (not from the beginning)

Design:
https://zpl.io/2jzPmlO

title: Authenticated -> Live Game -> From Beginning  OFF -> Feed Select page

||WHEN the user selects the Live game|THEN the feed select modal should appear with Audio(if applicable)/Video feeds.
|| WHEN any feed is selected|THEN the user should see a second modal to choose, Start From Beginning, Watch Live, or Resume (when applicable).

Design:
https://zpl.io/257wdg3

title: Free user->Favorite team-> Feed select modal on Hero
custom_preconds:
User should login with a Free account
Select any Live game and favorite the team
custom_steps:
1. User should Launch the MLB App 
2. Navigate to Top Nav and select the Home
3. Select 'Watch Live' or 'Watch Now' 

WHEN the user selects favorited team 'Watch Live' or 'Watch Now'
custom_expected:
||WHEN the user selects favorited team 'Watch Live' or 'Watch Now'|THEN the Feed Select modal should appear with Audio and Video feeds with a lock symbol for any feed the user doesn't have access to.
||WHEN the user select the Feed with lock icon| THEN subscription Feed select modal should appear.

Design:
https://www.figma.com/file/GXA6AEVwJY10f9iBG3zHQH/session?node-id=225:19196

title: Single Team->LIVE ->Favorite team-> Feed select modal on Hero
custom_preconds:
User should login with a Single team account
Select any Live game and favorite the team
custom_steps:
1. User should Launch the MLB App 
2. Navigate to Top Nav and select the Home
3. Select 'Watch Live' or 'Watch Now' 

WHEN the user selects favorited team 'Watch Live' or 'Watch Now'
custom_expected:
||WHEN the user selects favorited team 'Watch Live' or 'Watch Now'|THEN the Feed Select modal should appear with Audio and Video feeds with a lock symbol for any feed the user doesn't have access to.
||WHEN the user select the Feed with lock icon| THEN subscription Feed select modal should appear.
||WHEN the user select the feed with no lock icon|THEN user should see 'Watch Live', 'Watch From Beginning' feed select Modal.
||WHEN the user watch the game and exit out and relaunch the game| THEN Bookmark(Resume) should set and user should see the 'Watch Live', 'Watch From Beginning' and Resume in the Feed select modal when any feed is selected.
|| If Catchup is available | THEN user should see Catch up along with 'Watch Live', 'Watch From Beginning' and Resume 


Design:
https://www.figma.com/file/GXA6AEVwJY10f9iBG3zHQH/session?node-id=225:19196

title: MLBALL->Favorite team-> Feed select modal on Hero

User should login with a MLBALL account
Select any Live game and favorite the team
custom_steps:
1. User should Launch the MLB App 
2. Navigate to Top Nav and select the Home
3. Select 'Watch Live' or 'Watch Now'
custom_expected:
|| WHEN the user selects favorited team 'Watch Live' or 'Watch Now' |THEN the Feed Select modal should appear with Audio and Video feeds.
||WHEN any Video feed is selected |THEN user should see 'Watch Live', 'Watch From Beginning' feed select Modal
||WHEN the user watch the game and exit out and relaunch the game| THEN Bookmark(Resume) should set and user should see the 'Watch Live', 'Watch From Beginning' and Resume in the Feed select modal when any feed is selected.
|| If Catchup is available | THEN user should see Catch up along with 'Watch Live', 'Watch From Beginning' and Resume 

Design:
https://www.figma.com/file/GXA6AEVwJY10f9iBG3zHQH/MLB.TV-System?type=design&node-id=332-26096&t=S0ieBSS6G3iDaMP6-0

title: Authenticated -> Archived -> Single Team User -> Feed Select page
custom_preconds: User should login as a Single Team user
custom_steps:
1. User launches the MLB App
2. Navigate to Top Nav and select the Games
3. Select the Final game which the user is entitled 

WHEN Single Team user navigate to selects Archived game and selects the feed
custom_expected:
THEN the Feed Select modal should appear with Audio and Video feeds with a lock symbol for any feed the user doesn't have access to.
User should also see the Condensed Game and Recap options as well.
